publications.title: Neurovision: perceived image regeneration using cProGAN
publications.subtitle: Neural Computing and Applications
publications.description: Regenerating the perceived images using the EEG signals, the model build is cProGAN

publications.title: Deep Analysis on Fisheries Classification
publications.subtitle: 2020 IEEE 17th India Council International Conference (INDICON)
publications.description: The paper proposes an analysis of the techniques to classify different types of fishes caught on fishing boats without interference from humans using a Convolutional Neural Net (CNN). Different optimizers and different learning rates have been used and their findings have been evaluated in order to see how the two distinct CNN models work.

publications.title: Internet Traffic Classifier Using Artificial Neural Network and 1D-CNN
publications.subtitle: IEEE
publications.description: This paper proposes DNN approach which predict network traffics based on Fully Connected Neural Network(FCNN) and 1DConvolutional Neural Network(1D-CNN) model.

projects.title: EEG Classification using LSTM
projects.description: The electroencephalogram (EEG) is a bio-signal just like MRI, CT, fMRI. It is the recording of the electrical activity of the brain from the scalp. Our brain generates different EEG time-series patterns for different activities like moving hands, legs, eyes opening and closing, etc. So we can use deep learning techniques to recognize those patterns then we can classify them easily. Since this EEG signal is full of noise the major work involved here is to extract important features from the EEG data and then classify them. Since EEG is a time-series data so in this project the focus would be to use the Sequential network approach.

projects.title: Reconstruction of perceived images using GANs
projects.description: GANs are Generative Adversarial Networks. Recorded EEG signals from 128 different portion of the brain is being used. Whatever image the person perceives will be reconstructed. Working with pre-trained models to optimize the EEG features extracted. GANs are used for the reconstruction of the perceived images.

projects.title: Object Detection App
projects.description: Using the rear camera of android phones user will be able to detect the objects present in the clicked or uploaded image. The result can be obtained in JSON or image format as per the user‚Äôs choice. Django is used in the backend, YOLO algorithm is used for building object detection model

projects.title: Hand written digit cleaning done using KNN- Classifier
projects.description: Dependent and independent both the variables are pixel values after applying the model the image of the digits is made clear. K-Nearest Neighbors classifier has been used.

projects.title: Network Classification using Deep Learning Concept
projects.description: Will be able to classify different types of Internet Traffic classes. Concept Of CNN is being used.

projects.title: Training And Placement Website for IIIT Naya Raipur
projects.description: It is the Training And Placement Website for International Institute Of Information Technology Naya Raipur. The front end is done using HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap. Backend is done on PHP.

projects.title: YelpCamp Website-Campground location website
projects.description: Built using Node.js in the backend. Users can view different campground locations. They can also add new campground locations and delete the location if they want

projects.title: Voice Control Wheel Chair Prototype Using Arduino
projects.description: Based on the voice of the patient the wheelchair will move accordingly. The command where left, right, forward, backward. The programming on Arduino was done so as to move the chair according to the commands given.
